Hilda.line: Done, Santos. Speech given, pistons calibrated, everything. Need anything else?

Santos.line: Nah, I can take it from here. You go down there and catch some Zs, doll. Ya earned it.

Hilda.line: Right, I'll do that. By the way, Tom just asked if you were on the yoke. I told the truth.

Narrator.line: For a moment, Santos remains silent.

Santos.line: I... alright, she'll be apples. In any case, I'll take a look behind my back every now and then, heh.
